Translations.Text: My assign them companions zdobit everything they robi v ich oci. Thus they koniec incurring same fate previous obec z jinns humans bol i losers
Those disbelieved said nie listen do this Quran distort it ze ona zvitazit
My istota afflict these disbelievers severe retribution. My istota requite them ich zly robota
Such je requital awaits GOD's enemies. Hell bol ich eternal abode; iba requital for discarding our revelations
Those disbelieved say Our Lord show us those 2 laskavy! -jinns humans -Kto zmylit us my trample them our nohy render them lowliest
Those proclaim Our Lord bol GOD potom lead righteous zivot angels zostupit them Ona have fear nor shall ona rmutit sa! Rejoice dobry zvest Raj has rezervovat ona
My bol tvoj allies v this zivot Hereafter Ona have it anything ona zelat si ona have anything ona chudoba
(Such bol tvoj) ultimate abode z Forgiver Merciful
Kto utter lepsie words than jeden invites GOD zavodny righteousness says ja bol 1 z submitters
Nie equal bol dobry response zly response. Ona vyletne miesto nicest possible response. Thus jeden pouzivat bol tvoj enemy maj become tvoj lepsie znamy
Ziaden attain this those steadfastly persevere Ziaden attain this those bol extremely fortunate
When devil whispers idea ona ona seek refuge GOD He bol Hearer Omniscient
Among Jeho proofs bol night dni sun moon Nie prostrate sun nor moon ona jesen prostrate GOD created them ona truly kult Him alone
they je i arrogant robi this potom those tvoj Lord glorify Him night dni without vzdy tiring
Among Jeho proofs bol lenze ona see zem still potom mat rad skoro mat rad my lejak it zavlazit it vibrates zivot! Iste Jeden revived it revive dead He bol Omnipotent
Iste those distort our revelations nie zatajit us. Jeden gets thrown Hell lepsie jeden pod zabezpecit Dni Vzkriesenie? Robit whatever ona zelat; He bol Seer z everything ona robit
Those zamietnut Quran's proof when it pojdem them i zamietnut Honorable rezervovat si
Ziaden falsehood zapisat it v the minuly v the dalej; revelation z Wise Zasluzny
Co bol said do ona je precisely co bol said do previous posol! Tvoj Lord possesses forgiveness He i possesses painful retribution

My robit it non-Arabic Quran they said robit it pod v ze language? Whether bol Arabic non-Arabic say those verit it bol guide healing Mat rad for those disbelieve they bol deaf blind it mat rad they addressed z faraway
My dat Moses scripture it i disputed If nie bol tvoj Lord's predetermined decision they judged ihned. Indeed they harbor i vela doubts
Whoever zavodny righteousness robi for jeho own dobry whoever zavodny zly robi so jeho own detriment! Tvoj Lord bol never unjust towards ludia
